articles.title: SpaceX issues statement on Starship V3 Booster 18 anomaly - Teslarati
articles.description: The incident unfolded during gas-system pressure testing at the company’s Massey facility in Starbase, Texas.

articles.title: Google denies ‘misleading’ reports of Gmail using your emails to train AI - The Verge
articles.description: Google is pushing back on posts claiming it has changed its policy to use your Gmail messages and attachments to train AI models, telling The Verge that it does not train Gmail content for training Gemini.

articles.title: Return to the year 2000 with classic multiplayer DOS games in your browser - Ars Technica
articles.description: There are fan-made browser versions of Red Alert, Unreal Tournament, and more.

articles.title: Fallout 4 Gets New Update Following Anniversary Edition Backlash - GameSpot
articles.description: The Wasteland needs some help getting back on its feet after the fallout from the Anniversary edition of Fallout 4.

articles.title: Google Adds Gemini AI-Assistant to Android Auto - Gizmodo
articles.description: Gemini is spreading its tendrils to millions of additional vehicles.

articles.title: Apple TV Streaming Service Drops Price 54% in Black Friday Deal - Variety
articles.description: Apple on Friday introduced a new limited-time offer: New and returning Apple TV subscribers can sign up to get six months of the streaming service for $5.99 per month -- 54% off the regular price.

articles.title: Early Black Friday Deals: Best Buy Has Upped Their Game, and So Has Amazon - IGN
articles.description: Best Buy and Amazon unleash massive Early Black Friday 2025 deals, including huge savings on gaming PCs, consoles, controllers, 3D printers, collectibles, handhelds, GPUs, and more.

articles.title: AirPods Pro 3 and AirPods 4 drop to their best prices yet for Black Friday Week [Updated] - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Amazon drops AirPods Pro 3 to their best price ever, with AirPods 4 ANC also seeing a major Black Friday discount.

articles.title: Kirby Air Riders: The Best Custom Machines We've Seen So Far - Nintendo Life
articles.description: And how to make your own!

articles.title: Google continues to test ads in AI Mode results (update) (GOOGL:NASDAQ) - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Google (GOOG) (GOOGL) has started rolling out ads in AI mode for the first time ever. The company is now showing ads at the bottom of the results in AI Mode.

articles.title: In Kirby Air Riders, expression is more fun than racing - The Verge
articles.description: Kirby Air Riders on the Nintendo Switch 2, a sequel to the quirky GameCube racing game, has a robust suite of customization options that are fun to play with.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a 2-in-1 laptop and tablet for $70 during its Black Friday sale - TheStreet
articles.description: Shoppers say it "punches well above its weight."

articles.title: Microsoft is testing a Windows 11 tweak that preloads File Explorer in the background to make it faster - Windows Central
articles.description: Microsoft has announced that it's testing a change to File Explorer that's designed to make it launch faster, by preloading it in the background.

articles.title: The Game Awards 2025's Biggest Snubs - GameSpot
articles.description: Not every game can take home an award, but these are the ones we felt should have at least been nominated.

articles.title: Apple, IBD Stock Of The Day, Sets Up Before Holiday Season - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: The consumer electronics giant prepares for a busy shopping season.

articles.title: Starting today, Full Screen Experience for Windows 11 PCs is available for Xbox Insiders! - Xbox Wire
Microsoft: Out-of-band update fixes Windows 11 hotpatch install loop - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Microsoft has released an out-of-band cumulative update to fix a known issue causing the November 2025 KB5068966 hotpatch update to reinstall on Windows 11 systems repeatedly.

articles.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 European launch sales are 63% down over Battlefield 6 - The Game Business
articles.description: But a strong launch for Ubisoft's Anno 117: Pax Romana

articles.title: Apple’s cheapest iPad is already $70 off for Black Friday - The Verge
articles.description: Apple’s 11th-gen iPad is down to a record low price of $279 ($70 off) for Black Friday. The latest iPad Pro and iPad Air are also on sale.

articles.title: Best early Black Friday deals on 65-inch TVs: Samsung The Frame, LG C5 both 50% off - Mashable
